item.title: Woman set on fire on NYC subway identified, police say
item.description: The woman who was set on fire on the NYC subway has been identified as Debrina Kawam, of Toms River, New Jersey, police say.

item.title: Chinese hackers access U.S. Treasury Department workstations, officials say
item.description: Officials say cybercriminals backed by the Chinese state government hacked the U.S. Treasury Department system, accessing federal workstations and som...

item.title: 12/31: CBS Mornings Plus

item.title: Most of Puerto Rico hit by New Year's Eve power outage
item.description: Virtually all of Puerto Rico woke up on New Year's Eve to find there was no electricity, as a power outage hit the U.S. territory.

item.title: CBS News 24/7 Credits 2024
item.description: Recognizing the CBS journalists & production staff who worked tirelessly to provide 24/7 news coverage in 2024.
